scenario: HCA Healthcare Inc. reported first-quarter 2025 revenues of $18.32 billion, a 6% year-over-year increase, slightly above the consensus of $18.26 billion. Adjusted EPS was $6.45, surpassing the consensus of $5.76. Same-facility admissions increased by 2.6% and same-facility equivalent admissions increased by 2.8%. Same-facility emergency room visits increased by 4%. Same-facility inpatient surgeries increased by 0.2% and same-facility outpatient surgeries declined by 2.1%. Same-facility revenue per equivalent admission increased 2.9% compared to the first quarter of 2024. Net income attributable to HCA Healthcare totaled $1.61 billion, and adjusted EBITDA reached $3.73 billion. The company reaffirmed 2025 EPS of $24.05-$25.85 and a sales outlook of $72.8 billion-$75.8 billion. HCA Healthcare stock is down 0.463% at $323.86.
